title: Mastery Points/ Tokens @Riot
body: i saw the video about the new essence and stuff like that the changes ect ect. what are the plans with the mastery tokens and mastery levels on champions and such...how is it effecting that? i feel pressed to ask because thats something thats very important..but it wasn't talked about at all in the video..whats going to happen with our current tokens we haven't turned in? how will the new token system work?

replies.body: I haven't heard anything about this announced by our devs, so I imagine it will remain the same.  Keep an eye on our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for updated, though, and share any feedback you might have on our[ gameplay boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance).  Thanks for your concern, devs want your feedback so it's important your voice is heard!

ok well the current ranking system i hope isn't effected. i do think it is fine the way it is maybe add a few more mastery levels down the road...the only real issue i have..is the grading system...i think it really needs some adjusting and tweaking,......when you can go 18/3 on an adc and only get a b+ because you didn't kill like 300 minions.....it makes you not wanna play the role...it makes you not want to care and to give up....to me right now adc role is not fun at all....alot because of the grading system...no matter how good i do..i just cant get that s.,.and then you get stuff like talon and zed and really....alot of the grading systems just need tweaking its currently whats making the game unfun for me...

"no matter how good you do....your not good enough.....but thanks for the carry anyway" is what it says right now....
